titles.title: To reimburse the State of Texas for Operation Lone Star, and for other purposes.
To reimburse the State of Texas for Operation Lone Star, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight, Management, and Accountability.

bill.summary:
This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security to reimburse the state of Texas for the costs incurred in FY2021 and FY2022 for Operation Lone Star.
(Operation Lone Star is a border security operation initiated and carried out by the state of Texas.)
